title: Training Tracey
description: I know it's wrong to want my best friend's dad... but what about when his wife offers to share?Tracey has known the Burtons practically all her life.They're her best friend's parents.When she was a little girl they took her on days out to the beach. But she's a woman now, and they have some very important lessons to teach her...If you loved Selena Kitt's Babysitting the Baumgartners, then you're going to love Training Tracey.** Training Tracey is A wicked and uber-hot coming-of-age menage, filled with MF, FF & MFF scenes. There is NO cheating, NO cliffhanger and a guaranteed HEA with plenty of steam.**WARNING 18+: This book is erotic and contains material that includes graphic language and adult situations.
author: L.M. Mountford
